name: Pandamic
description:
Every 100 years the Bamboo King awakens, bringing torment and sickness to all the young pandas. With your powers of the red panda, you must find and bring the panda community together to save Panda Isle!

Cast spells by drawing shapes with your mouse. Find and collect all the pandas and save the day!

Controls:

Mouse: Click objects, cast spells, look around

E: Exit Spell

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move

Plus sign (+): Zoom in map

Minus sign (-): Zoom out map

Squiizt, BlendGirl: Art
